verses.verse: But as for you, <S%G2980>speak<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> are <S%G4241>fitting<s%> for <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine.<s%>

<S%G4246>Older<s%> <S%G4246>men<s%> are to be <S%G3524>temperate,<s%> <S%G4586>dignified,<s%> <S%G4998>sensible,<s%> <S%G5198>sound<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> in <S%G26>love,<s%> in <S%G5281>perseverance.<s%>

<S%G4247>Older<s%> <S%G4247>women<s%> <S%G5615>likewise<s%> are to be <S%G2412>reverent<s%> in their <S%G2688>behavior,<s%> not <S%G1228>malicious<s%> <S%G1228>gossips,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G1402>enslaved<s%> to <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> <S%G2567>teaching<s%> <S%G2567>what<s%> is <S%G2567>good,<s%>
that they may <S%G4994>encourage<s%> the <S%G3501>young<s%> <S%G3501>women<s%> to <S%G5362>love<s%> their <S%G5362>husbands,<s%> to <S%G5388>love<s%> their <S%G5388>children,<s%>

[to be] <S%G4998>sensible,<s%> <S%G53>pure,<s%> <S%G3626>workers<s%> at <S%G3626>home,<s%> <S%G18>kind,<s%> being <S%G5293>subject<s%> to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands,<s%> that the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> may not be <S%G987>dishonored.<s%>

in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3930>show<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> to be an <S%G5179>example<s%> of <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>deeds,<s%> [with] <S%G7026>purity<s%> in <S%G1319>doctrine,<s%> <S%G4587>dignified,<s%>

<S%G5199>sound<s%> [in] <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G176>which<s%> is <S%G176>beyond<s%> <S%G176>reproach,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that the <S%G1727>opponent<s%> may be <S%G1788>put<s%> to <S%G1788>shame,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G5337>bad<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> us.
[Urge] <S%G1401>bondslaves<s%> to be <S%G5293>subject<s%> to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1203>masters<s%> in <S%G3956>everything,<s%> to be well-pleasing, not <S%G483>argumentative,<s%>

not <S%G3557>pilfering,<s%> but <S%G1731>showing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> that they may <S%G2885>adorn<s%> the <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>respect.<s%>

<S%G3811>instructing<s%> us to <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%> and <S%G2886>worldly<s%> <S%G1939>desires<s%> and to <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G4996>sensibly,<s%> <S%G1346>righteously<s%> and <S%G2153>godly<s%> in the <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G165>age,<s%>

<S%G4327>looking<s%> for the <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> and the <S%G2015>appearing<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of our <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> for us, that He might <S%G3084>redeem<s%> us from <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G458>lawless<s%> <S%G458>deed<s%> and <S%G2511>purify<s%> for <S%G1438>Himself<s%> a <S%G2992>people<s%> for His <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4041>possession,<s%> <S%G2207>zealous<s%> for <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>
